name: TheMobileGamer
tag_list: mobile-gaming, mobile-entertainment, mobile-applications, freemium, mobile-trial, java-applications, free-java-games, try-before-you-buy, phone-applications, game-applications, iphone-applications, android-applications
overview:
TMG brings social games to mobile devices.

We currently have over 500,000 players with thousands more joining everyday. 300,000 have played our games in the last month and we serve an average of 50,000 players daily.

Our games are available on leading mobile social networks like mig33, mozat and also through our own KotaGames portal.

KotaGames is a mobile portal for users to enjoy our portfolio of browser-based social games without downloading or installing any applications. The browser-based approach allows us to reach majority of devices including non-smartphones like Nokia and Sony Ericsson models; for smartphone users we are developing BB/Android social gaming browsers to deliver a superior user experience.

Some of our games include: Club Wars, Monster Fight, Fun Factory

Our games are available for free and we monetize from more than 6% of users buy virtual items using SMS and other payment methods. We also work with brands and agencies to engage their audience through in-game marketing campaigns.

Our goal is to be the market leader for mobile social games in SEA; bringing the social gaming experience to our users who mostly do not have access to PCs or stable internet connections.

funding_rounds.source_description: TheMobileGamer Receives $1M in Series A Funding from One97 Communications

milestones.description: TMG receives seed financing from Innosight Ventures
